data.message: I'm from pa and just to keep it real I'm a recovering addict and in the high of your career my life was in shambles I have two sons one in recovery and one not but it was them who turned me on to rap in general but I'm clean today and when I hear of what you been threw it's not different than my war story  but I listen now really listen and everything is so much cleaner you the shit be proud I know for me I had to go threw hell to get to heaven!!
